name: Tripadvisor Reviews
special_instructions: startUrls is a required field. Paste here a URL(s) of a specific place you want to get reviews from.
Use a large value (for example 1 million) for maxReviews to get all reviews from each place.
lastReviewDate is a date where the scraper stops loading older reviews.
Scrape reviewer info (name, profile picture, location etc.). You should only extract reviewer's info if you have a legit reason to do so.
Select the desired language for the reviews.
Enable verbose logs for debugging purposes with debugLog.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
